overview: As a tech-savvy communicator providing social media and e-Customer Relationship Marketing services to the FMCG market in Europe, Aruna brings in a wealth of experience working across England to Australia (with many Asian cities in between!) in roles that covers most of the communication spectrum, an MBA and a Masters in Human Resources Management, a number of IT post-graduate courses and diplomas, and more pertinently, knowledge of men and matters.

degrees.subject: IT, HR and Business Administration
degrees.institution: La Trobe Graduate School of Management, Australia

degrees.subject: Strategic Human Resources Management, Change Management, Managing Culture and Communications
